directions: Place flour, paprika, sage, Creole seasoning, cayenne pepper, black pepper, and garlic powder in a large, resealable plastic bag. Place pork chops in the bag, seal, and shake to coat chops.
In a large skillet, heat oil over high heat for about 1 minute.  Arrange chops in pan, and reduce heat to medium.  Cook until pork chops are dark brown, about 6 to 8 minutes per side.
title: Cajun Pork Chops
